data.name: Doomsday
data.detailed_description:
Doomsday is a new JRPG styled psychological horror RPG game taking place in the late 1960s- about the kidnapping of Cathy-Anne, and her journey to escape a dangerous animal-human hybrid doomsday cult-- along with the help of her friends. Will her pals and her trusty knife be enough to get her out alive...?

The game is plot based, using a linear story progression. Also features unique mini-game mechanics within a turn-based battle system, as well as multiple possible endings depending on the choices you make!

Will her pals and her trusty knife be enough to get her out alive...?

The game is plot based, using a linear story progression. Also features unique mini-game mechanics within a turn-based battle system, as well as multiple possible endings depending on the choices you make!
data.short_description: Doomsday is a JRPG styled psychological horror that takes place in the late 60s. The story follows the kidnapping of teen girl Cathy-Anne, and her friends determined to save her- all the while they uncover the mysterious animal-human hybrid doomsday cult they've stumbled across.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Additional Notes: super computer

content_descriptors.notes: There is imagery of blood and internal organs at multiple points throughout the game. There are also depictions of mental illness, lobotomies, and in one ending- suicide.
